faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Have questions?
faq.subtitleFull: Find answers to common questions about AlmaNEO
faq.contactCta: Can't find what you're looking for?

whatIsAlmaNEO.question: What is AlmaNEO?
whatIsAlmaNEO.answer: AlmaNEO is a project that addresses AI inequality and embodies the value of "Jeong (ÊÉÖ)" in blockchain. Through three core solutions‚ÄîGlobal AI Inequality Index (GAII), AI Hub, and Kindness Protocol‚Äîwe're building a world where all 8 billion humans can benefit from AI.

whatIsJeong.question: What is "Jeong (ÊÉÖ)"?
whatIsJeong.answer: Jeong is a uniquely Korean concept that goes beyond simple kindness. It represents deep bonds and unspoken understanding built over time. AlmaNEO digitalizes and rewards this value of Jeong through the Kindness Protocol.

totalSupply.question: What is the total supply of ALMAN tokens?
totalSupply.answer: The total supply of ALMAN tokens is 8 billion. This symbolizes Earth's 8 billion people and embodies the philosophy of "1 token per person." Tokens are issued on the Polygon network following the ERC-20 standard.

howToGetToken.question: How can I get ALMAN tokens?
howToGetToken.answer: 1) Mine through Tap-to-Earn in Kindness Game 2) Participate in airdrops (based on kindness activities) 3) Staking rewards 4) Purchase on DEX/CEX in the future. Initially, gaming and airdrops are the main ways to earn.

whichBlockchain.question: Which blockchain do you use?
whichBlockchain.answer: AlmaNEO uses the Polygon network. Polygon offers Ethereum compatibility, low gas fees, and fast transactions, enabling Global South users to participate without burden.

noWallet.question: Can I participate without a wallet?
noWallet.answer: Yes! You can log in directly with Google, Facebook, X, and other social accounts through Web3Auth. No wallet setup or seed phrase management required, and with Biconomy integration, most transactions are gas-free.

whatIsJeongSBT.question: What is Jeong-SBT?
whatIsJeongSBT.answer: Jeong-SBT is a non-transferable Soulbound Token that records your Kindness Score. It grows through 4 tiers (Seed ‚Üí Sprout ‚Üí Tree ‚Üí Forest), with higher tiers receiving benefits like NFT fee discounts and staking bonuses.

nftMarketplaceFeatures.question: What are the NFT marketplace features?
nftMarketplaceFeatures.answer: 1) Gas-free (Biconomy integration) 2) Up to 50% fee discount for Jeong-SBT holders 3) Additional 5% discount for ALMAN token payments 4) NFT rental support (ERC-4907/5006) 5) Multiple payment options (POL, USDC, ALMAN)

howStakingWorks.question: How does staking work?
howStakingWorks.answer: Deposit ALMAN tokens to earn 5-18% annual rewards. Divided into 4 tiers (30/90/180/365 days), with additional bonuses based on your Jeong-SBT tier. Staked tokens also grant governance voting rights.

whatIsKindnessGame.question: What is the Kindness Game?
whatIsKindnessGame.answer: A Tap-to-Earn game where you mine ALMAN tokens by tapping the screen. Features include daily quests, upgrade systems, and leaderboard competition. 800 million ALMAN (10% of total supply) is allocated to the mining pool.
